meanings.sent1: The apple picker collected ripe fruits from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The berry picker filled her basket with fresh berries.
meanings.sent3: The flower picker accidentally picked a dandelion instead of a rose.
meanings.sent4: The picker of seashells carefully selected the most colorful ones.
meanings.sent5: The mushroom picker knew exactly which ones were safe to gather.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for picking or selecting
meanings.sent1: The fruit picker helped reach the apples at the top of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The guitar picker carefully plucked the strings to create music.
meanings.sent3: The salad picker made it easy to choose the freshest vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The color picker on the computer screen allowed for precise selection.
meanings.sent5: The toothpick was a handy little picker for removing food stuck between teeth.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for picking or harvesting
meanings.sent1: The berry picker machine quickly gathered all the ripe fruits.
meanings.sent2: The cotton picker efficiently harvested the fields.
meanings.sent3: The apple picker device made picking apples much faster.
meanings.sent4: The mechanical picker sorted through the produce with ease.
meanings.sent5: The automated picker saved a lot of time during the harvest season.

meanings.definition: A person who selects or chooses from a group
meanings.sent1: The team captain was the picker for the game lineup.
meanings.sent2: The book club picker chose the next novel for discussion.
meanings.sent3: The movie night picker always selected the best films to watch.
meanings.sent4: The menu picker had the difficult task of choosing dishes for the event.
meanings.sent5: The color picker for the paint samples helped decide on the perfect shade.
